header:
<js>
(()=>{
	var timestamp = parseInt(Date.now()/1000);
	var aid = java.androidId();
	var sign = java.md5Encode(aid+timestamp+"9495ef469eb3e7ae8ef3");
	var header = {
		"deviceType":"android",
		"appVersion":"4.78",
		"User-Agent":"okhttp/4.8.0",
		"deviceIdentify":aid,
		"signature":sign,
		"timestamp":timestamp,
		"headerRequestSource":"lianhe"
		};
		return JSON.stringify(header)
})()
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var volume = 1
var list = []
JSON.parse(result).data.forEach(Str => {
	if(volume == 1){
    list.push({ 
    	 "Name":Str.volume_name,
   	  "isVolume":true
   	})
 }
   Str.chapter_list.forEach(str => {
      list.push({
         "Name": str.chapter_name,
         "url": "https://android-api.xrzww.com/api/readWithEncrypt?chapter_id=" + str.chapter_id + "&nid=" + str.chapter_nid + "&preload=0",
         "vip": str.chapter_ispay,
         "time": java.timeFormatUTC(str.chapter_time*1000,`yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss（${str.chapter_number}字）`,28800000)
      })
    })
  })
JSON.stringify(list)
</js>$.*

ruleToc.chapterName:
$.chapter_name@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
hi=java.get("hi");
hia=hi.match(/pageStart=(\d+)/)[1]
java.log(hia)
a = java.get("c");
b=String(a).replace(/\[(.*)\]/,'$1').replace(/\"/g,'').replace(/\s/g,'');
//java.log(b)
if (typeof b == 'string') {
    b = b.split(','); 
}
//java.log(nextChapterUrl)
c = nextChapterUrl.match(/pageStart= {0,1}(\d+)/);
c = parseInt(c[1]); 
results = [];
for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) {
        currentPage = parseInt(b[i]);
        if (isNaN(currentPage)) {
            continue;
        }
        if (currentPage > c) {
            break;
        }
        if (currentPage > hia && currentPage < c) {
            url = baseUrl.replace(/(pageStart=)\d+/, '$1' + currentPage);
            results.push(url);
        }
    }results
</js>

while(j<l) {
  if (i<k) {

      ch.no = $.page[j];

    }

  } else {

    ch.no = $.page[j];

  }
}

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

.bookbox,.tabsnav,.jianjie-popup@js:
bookUrl = String(java.getRedirectUrl())

let toc = java.getString('.more-btn@href');if(toc==''){let read = String(java.getString('.btn.0@href')).replace(/https?:\/\/.*?(?=\/)/).split('/');let len=read.length;if(len>3){if(/\d$/.test(read)){toc = bookUrl.replace(/\.[^\/]*$/,'/')}else{let tp=read[len-1].match(/\.[^.\/]+$/);java.put('path', '/'+read[1]+'/');java.put('tp', tp?tp[0]:'');toc = String(bookUrl).replace(/.html?$/,'.json')}}else{toc = read.join('/')}}java.put('toc',toc);tags=src.match(/tags\s*:\s*['"](.*)['"]/);if(tags&&tags[1]!='')java.put('tags','🏷 标签：'+tags[1].replace(/\|$/,'')+'\n📜 简介：');result

eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url') + '/search/photos/' + get('shunt',Get('p') - 1) + '&search_query=' + e.replace(/\s.*$|\/.*$/g, '') + '&main_tag=0&page={{page}}';
}(key));
